name: frisk
effect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it reveals an opposing Pokémon's held item to all participating trainers. In a double battle, if one opponent has an item, this Pokémon will Frisk that Pokémon; if both have an item, it will Frisk one at random.
short_effect: Reveals an opponent's held item upon entering battle.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The Pokémon can check the foe’s held item.
flavor_text.platinum: The Pokémon can check the foe’s held item.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The Pokémon can check the foe’s held item.
